Module dev.kkorolyov.flopple
Package dev.kkorolyov.flopple.collections

Class Iterables

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.flopple.collections.Iterables
public final class Iterables extends Object
Additional utility methods for generating or otherwise working with Iterables.

      Parameters:
